title: Consumer Credit Legislation
description: This chapter explores major consumer credit laws that protect borrowers, including how these laws ensure fairness, transparency, and equality in lending practices. Students will learn about their rights and responsibilities when borrowing money and how to identify potential violations of consumer protection laws.
learning_objectives: Understand the major consumer credit laws and their key protections
Identify how consumer protection laws impact borrowing decisions
Recognize potential violations of consumer credit rights
Apply knowledge of consumer credit laws to real-world scenarios
Develop strategies for protecting consumer rights
Create a personal guide to credit law protections
